What country is ð¬ð¾?

People often ask which country uses ð¬ð¾ emoji flag. The answer is Guyana . Guyana is located in South America continent. The country area is 214969 km2, and the capital city is Georgetown ( 6.80448 , -58.15527 ). Some of the neighboring countries are Brazil, Suriname, Venezuela , and the country is not landlocked. Some of the timezones in Guyana are UTC-04:00 . The currency used in Guyana is Guyanese dollar ( GYD ). People in Guyana speak mostly English . Guyana is part of the South America region.
